scripts.deploy: truffle compile && truffle migrate --reset --verbose-rpc && npm run dapp
scripts.dapp: npm run lib && webpack-dev-server --mode development --config webpack.config.dapp.js
scripts.server: rm -rf ./build/server && npm run lib && webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.server.js
scripts.dapp:prod: npm run lib:prod && webpack --mode production  --config webpack.config.dapp.js
scripts.server:prod: rm -rf ./build/server && npm run lib:prod && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.server.js
